segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink and spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes and not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so unaware of what's happening right next to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit scared watching him balance like that, he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be really surprised when she finally notices the water and the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the contrast between the calm outside and the messy inside is quite interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking the cookies or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR
